briefTitle: Open Label Safety Study in Acute Treatment of Migraine
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open Label Long-Term Safety Study of BHV-3000 in the Acute Treatment of Migraine
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate safety and tolerability of BHV-3000 (rimegepant).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With SAEs and AEs Leading to Discontinuation During the Treatment Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: PRN (2-8) and PRN (9-14) groups: Up to 52 weeks; Scheduled EOD + PRN group: Up to 12 weeks
